entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Mingan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Longue-Pointe-de-Mingan 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: S 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 1.
